mapper.sql: permission_id, parent_permission_id, permission_code, permission_type, permission_name, menu_url, menu_open_mode, valid, sort_seq
mapper.select: select DISTINCT p.permission_id from saas_permission p,saas_role_permission_ralation rp, saas_role r, saas_user_role_ralation ur where p.permission_id=rp.permission_id and rp.role_id=r.role_id and r.role_id=ur.role_id and p.valid=1 and r.valid=1 and ur.user_id=#{userId}

select DISTINCT p.permission_code from saas_permission p,saas_role_permission_ralation rp, saas_role r, saas_user_role_ralation ur where p.permission_id=rp.permission_id and rp.role_id=r.role_id and r.role_id=ur.role_id and p.valid=1 and r.valid=1 and ur.user_id=#{userId}
